text:
Optiver | Amsterdam, The Netherlands (On-site, not remote)

Data Engineer in the Quantitative Trading field

(Python, Spark, AWS, Mesos, Docker, Tensorflow, GPUâ€™s)

As a Data Engineer you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our data pipeline. You will be working with Researchers and other Engineers on the Quantitative Trading team, turning market data into successful trading strategies. Besides the challenging day-to-day engineering you will also explore new technologies and better ways to solve current and future problems.

https://www.optiver.com/eu/en/job-opportunities/eu-661047

Fell free to get in touch - catiasousa@optiver.com
